level.text: There is established the career and technical education grant program, which shall be administered by OSSE, that, beginning in the 2015-2016 school year, shall provide supplemental funds to DCPS and to public charter schools to support and enhance career and technical education programs.
Grants awarded pursuant to the CTE grant program shall be supplemental to Formula, federal, or other funds received by a school for career and technical education.
By October 1, 2014, OSSE shall issue regulations for the implementation of this section.
